summary.span: 表示 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Represents a 64-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不可變的實值類型代表帶正負號的整數值的範圍是從負 9223372036854775808 (這由常數) 到正 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 （這由常數。 is an immutable value type that represents signed integers with values that range from negative 9,223,372,036,854,775,808 (which is represented by the constant) through positive 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 (which is represented by the constant. .NET Framework 也會包含不帶正負號的 64 位元整數值型別， ，代表範圍從 0 到 18446744073709551615 的值。The .NET Framework also includes an unsigned 64-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from 0 to 18,446,744,073,709,551,615. ## 具現化的 Int64 值Instantiating an Int64 Value 您可以具現化數種方式的值：You can instantiate an value in several ways: - 您可以宣告變數並將其指派的範圍內的常值的整數值資料型別。You can declare an variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下列範例會宣告兩個變數並將它們指派這種方式中的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/cs/instantiate1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/vb/instantiate1.vb#1)] - 您可以指派其範圍是子集整數類資料類型值的型別。You can assign the value of an integral type whose range is a subset of the type. 這是不需要在 C# 中的轉換運算子或轉換方法，在 Visual Basic 中的擴展轉換。This is a widening conversion that does not require a cast operator in C# or a conversion method in Visual Basic. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/cs/instantiate1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/vb/instantiate1.vb#4)] - 您可以指派的範圍超過的數值類型的值的型別。You can assign the value of a numeric type whose range exceeds that of the type. 這是縮小轉換，因此如果需要轉換運算子，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的轉換方法`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 如果數值為， ，或包含小數部分，其小數部分處理的值取決於編譯器執行轉換。If the numeric value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 下列範例會將指派到幾個數值的縮小轉換變數。The following example performs narrowing conversions to assign several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/cs/instantiate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/vb/instantiate1.vb#2)] - 您可以呼叫的方法類別，以轉換任何支援的型別值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to an value. 這可能是因為支援介面。This is possible because supports the interface. 下列範例說明陣列的轉換值值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt64#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/cs/toint64_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt64#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/vb/toint64_1.vb#4)] - 您可以呼叫或方法，將轉換的字串表示值設定為。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of an value to an . 字串可以包含十進位或十六進位的數字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下列範例說明使用十進位和十六進位字串的剖析作業。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/cs/instantiate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.instantiation/vb/instantiate1.vb#3)] ## Int64 值上執行的作業Performing Operations on Int64 Values 型別支援標準的數學運算，例如加法、 減法、 除法、 乘法、 否定和一元否定運算。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, negation, and unary negation. 類似其他整數類資料類型，類型也支援位元`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左 shift 和向右移位運算子。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 您可以使用標準數值運算子比較兩個值，或者您可以呼叫或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 您也可以呼叫的成員類別以執行各種不同的數字的操作，包括取得數值的絕對值，計算商數及餘數整數除法運算，判斷兩個最大或最小值長整數、 取得數字符號和數字捨入。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two long integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## Int64 表示為字串Representing an Int64 as a String 類型提供完整支援標準和自訂數值格式字串。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) 若要格式化值為沒有前置零的整數類資料字串，您可以呼叫無參數方法。To format an value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 您也可以藉由使用"D"格式規範，包含指定的數字的字串表示法中的前置零。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 藉由使用"N"格式規範，您可以包含群組分隔符號，並指定要顯示的數字的字串表示中的小數位數數目。By using the "N" format specifier, you can include group separators and specify the number of decimal digits to appear in the string representation of the number. 您可以藉由使用"X"格式規範，表示做為十六進位字串值。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent an value as a hexadecimal string. 下列範例會格式化的陣列中的項目下列四種方式的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these four ways. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#1)] 您也可以格式化值為二進位，八進位，藉由呼叫十進位或十六進位字串方法並提供做為方法的第二個參數的基底。You can also format an value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下列範例會呼叫這個方法，以顯示 binary、 八進位和十六進位表示法之數值的陣列。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of integer values. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.int64.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#2)] ## 使用非十進位 32 位元整數值Working with Non-Decimal 32-Bit Integer Values 除了使用個別的長整數做為十進位值，您可能想要執行位元運算的長整數的值，或者它會使用二進位或十六進位表示法的長整數值。In addition to working with individual long integers as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with long integer values, or work with the binary or hexadecimal representations of long integer values. 值會表示 63 個位元，以做為正負號位元的六十第四位元。 values are represented in 63 bits, with the sixty-fourth bit used as a sign bit. 正值是利用號和大小表示法來表示。Positive values are represented by using sign-and-magnitude representation. 負數值是二的補數表示法中。Negative values are in two's complement representation. 這是重要請記住，當您在上執行位元運算值，或當您使用個別位元。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要執行數值、 布林值或在任何兩個非十進位值的比較作業，這兩個值都必須使用相同的表示法。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有轉換`value`參數物件。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 根據您的程式語言，可能會以程式碼方法的參數型別具有較少的位元的位置 （較窄） 與執行個體類型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 這可能是因為有些程式語言會執行隱含擴展轉換，表示參數為型別與相同位元數與執行個體。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假設執行個體類型是和參數類型是。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值指示物件，然後產生比較的值的方法執行個體和參數表示法。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否數值類型上執行隱含的擴展轉換。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型和非泛型版本的數個值和參考類型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the method for several value and reference types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法通常用來將各種不同的方式來格式化的文字轉換值。This overload of the method is typically used to convert text that can be formatted in a variety of ways to an value. 例如，它可以用來將由使用者 HTML 文字方塊中輸入數值的文字轉換。For example, it can be used to convert the text entered by a user into an HTML text box to a numeric value. `s`參數包含數字的格式：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][sign]digits[ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選擇性的項目和其他項目如下。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional, and other items are as follows. wsws 選擇性的泛空白字元。An optional white space. Signsign 選擇性的符號。An optional sign. digitsdigits 範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9. `s`參數會使用解譯樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十進位數字，只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要明確地定義中可以存在的樣式項目`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use the method. `provider`參數是實作，例如或物件。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a or object. `provider`參數提供特定文化特性格式資訊`s`。The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information about the format of `s`. 如果`provider`是`null`、會使用目前文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例是按鈕 click 事件處理常式的 Web 表單。The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form. 它會使用所傳回的陣列屬性來判斷使用者的地區設定。It uses the array returned by the property to determine the user's locale. 它接著會執行個體化對應至該地區設定的物件。It then instantiates a object that corresponds to that locale. 所屬的物件物件隨後會傳遞至方法，將使用者轉換的輸入來值。The object that belongs to that object is then passed to the method to convert the user's input to an value. returns.span: 這個執行個體值的字串表示，包含減號 (如果數值為負) 及一連串範圍由 0 到 9 的數字 (沒有前置字元零)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式預設值 （"G"或一般） 中的值使用的格式目前文化特性的物件。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of the current culture. 如果您想要指定不同的格式或文化特性，使用的其他多載方法，如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|文化特性For culture|使用的多載Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |預設值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定文化特性A specific culture|| |以特定格式A specific format|預設值 （目前） 的文化特性Default (current) culture|| |以特定格式A specific format|特定文化特性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，下列格式的主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示值使用預設方法。The following example displays an value using the default method. 它也會顯示的字串表示天時，使用標準格式規範數目的值。It also displays the string representations of the value that results from using a number of standard format specifiers. 使用 EN-US 文化特性的格式化慣例來顯示範例。The examples are displayed using the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式預設值 （"G"或一般） 中的值使用的格式指定文化特性的物件。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果您想要指定不同的格式或目前的文化特性，使用的其他多載方法，如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or the current culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|文化特性For culture|使用的多載Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |預設值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|預設值 （目前） 的文化特性Default (current) culture|| |以特定格式A specific format|預設值 （目前） 的文化特性Default (current) culture|| |以特定格式A specific format|特定文化特性A specific culture|| `provider`參數是該物件會實作介面。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供這個方法所傳回的字串格式的相關特定文化特性資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 實作的物件可以是下列任一項：The object that implements can be any of the following: - A代表其格式化規則所要使用的文化特性的物件。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - A物件，其中包含此值的特定數值格式設定資訊。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 自訂物件實作，且方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom object that implements and whose method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`或物件無法從取得`provider`，傳回值會以格式化目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted with the object for the current culture. .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，下列格式的主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試的`s`無效，無法成功剖析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed. `s`參數包含數字的格式：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][sign]digits[ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表描述每個項目。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。An optional white space.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性的符號。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|範圍從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`參數會使用解譯樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十進位數字，只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要明確定義的樣式項目中可以存在的特定文化特性格式資訊以及`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中物件初始化為目前的系統文化特性。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current system culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個多載方法解譯中的所有位數`s`參數做為十進位數字。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要剖析的十六進位數字的字串表示，呼叫多載。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法使用不同的字串值的數目。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. [!code-csharp[System.Int64.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int64.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int64.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int64.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)] 某些字串的方法是無法在此範例中，將會：Some of the strings that the method is unable to convert in this example are: - "9432.0"."9432.0". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含小數點。它必須包含整數數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only. - "16,667"."16,667". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含群組分隔符號。它必須包含整數數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only. - "(100)"."(100)". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含目前的文化特性所定義的非負號和屬性。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's and properties. - 「 01FA"。"01FA". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含十六進位數字。它必須包含十進位數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法就像方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試的`s`無效，無法成功剖析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be parsed successfully. `style`參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空白字元或正或負號）`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or a positive or negative sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`、`s`參數可以包含下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`,the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws][ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`參數包含:Or, if the `style` parameter includes : [ws]hexdigits[ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表描述每個項目。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或結尾處`s`如果`style`包含旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義屬性所傳回物件方法`provider`參數。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性的符號。An optional sign. 正負符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含或旗標。A sign symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the or flags.| |*digits**digits*

*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*

*exponential_digits**exponential_digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9. 如*fractional_digits*，只為 0 的數字會有效。For *fractional_digits*, only the digit 0 is valid.| |*、**,*|特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。A culture-specific thousands separator. 千分位分隔符號所指定的文化特性`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The thousands separator of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的小數點符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 所指定的文化特性的小數點符號`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*e**e*|'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示此值會以指數標記法表示。The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
